EmailTemplate.name: EU Term: Internal Terminating Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: (Account Name) Termination Notification
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
marketing@sunpowercorp.com; AnaMarie.Molano@sunpowercorp.com; financing@sunpowercorp.com
{!Account.Id}
{!Account.Name} has been marked as Terminating in SFDC with 10 day notice. Please review the termination letter, manage shipment of all open orders and collect any receivables.
Thank You.
Mei Juknelis Partner Ambassador Manager Residential and Light Commercial Business Unit
145 Rio Robles San Jose, CA 95134 Phone: 408.240.5580 Fax: 408.240.5400 www.sunpowercorp.com
